title: Presidents' Day sales 2022: when is it and deals we can expect
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Your guide to the 2022 Presidents' Day sales event
article: While Presidents' Day sales might seem like eons away, there's no better time than the present to start preparing for next year's deals event. So we've created this guide to tell you everything about the 2022 Presidents' Day sales event with everything you need to know, plus what deals you can expect. So what's on sale during Presidents' Day? The holiday weekend typically focuses on home items with massive discounts on furniture, major appliances, kitchen devices, and vacuums. You'll also find best-ever offers on mattresses with sitewide sales and free accessories from online brands like Nectar, Purple, Casper, and more. If you're looking for tech bargains, you can also find Presidents' Day sales from Dell and HP and TV deals from big retailers like Best Buy, Walmart, and Amazon. Presidents' Day falls on Monday, February 21 this year, giving us plenty of time to prepare for the holiday weekend. Below you'll find everything you need to know, such as when deals start, where you can find the best bargains, and you can take a look at last year's top offers. If you're looking for a bargain right now, you can see our guide to the 2021 Labor Day sales event.
Presidents' Day is a US federal holiday that takes place on the third Monday of February to celebrate all US presidents. In 2022, Presidents' Day falls on Monday, February 21.

We typically start to see Presidents' Day sales popping up in early February, with mattress and appliance deals from Home Depot and Lowe's leading the pack. You'll find tech sites like Dell and HP launching their sales the week before Presidents' Day, and big retailers like Best Buy and Walmart typically hold off and kick off their promotions during the holiday weekend event. We'll be updating this page with all the best early offers, so make sure to bookmark this page for all the latest updates.

Presidents' Day sales typically focus on home items with impressive discounts on major appliances, kitchen devices, furniture, and vacuums from retailers like Home Depot, Wayfair, Lowe's, Target, and more. You'll also find best-ever deals on mattresses from online brands, including Nectar, Tuft & Needle, and Purple. If you're interested in tech deals, you'll find clearance prices on last year's best-selling tech with offers on laptops from HP and Dell and TV bargains from Best Buy, Walmart, and Amazon.
